comment: The union of a quotient set, like ~ uniqs but with a weaker antecedent: only the restricion of ` R ` by ` A ` needs to be a set, not ` R ` itself, see e.g. ~ cnvepima . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 20-Jun-2019.)
